name: Entrada Associates
overview:
Entrada Associates is an integrated management advisory and investment banking firm dedicated to serving the needs of emerging companies. The firm specializes in growth and turnaround management, equity/debt fund raising and M&A advisory services. The principals have significant operational as well as M&A experience and are therefore able to provide strategic advisory and operational assistance as well as transactional and capital market services.

. Entrada principals have executed over $800m in equity and debt transactions and have relationships with over 400 Venture Capital and Private Equity funds as well as senior and mezzanine lenders.
